// this is the test for the instruction MADD, MADDU, MSUB, MSUBU

 ADDI $8, $8, 0x1234    // 1 bfc00000 08 00001234 
 LUI  $9      0x5678    // 1 bfc00004 09 56780000
 ADD  $10, $8, $9       // 1 bfc00008 0a 56781234
 ADDI $4, $4, 0x1357    // 1 bfc0000c 04 00001357
 LUI  $5      0x2468    // 1 bfc00010 05 24680000
 ADD  $6, $4, $5        // 1 bfc00014 06 24681357
 ADDI $11, $11, 0x2046  // 1 bfc00018 0b 00002046
 LUI  $12       0x7f6e  // 1 bfc0001c 0c 7f6e0000
 ADD  $13, $11, $12     // 1 bfc00020 0d 7f6e2046

 MULT $6, $10           // HI:0C4C09DF LO:01480BAC
 MADDU $10, $13          // HI:0C4C09DF+2B0AC386=3756CD65 LO:01480BAC+45737A38=46BB85E4
 MFHI $21               // 1 bfc0002c 15 3756cd65

 
 MSUBU $21, $13          // 3756cd6546bb85e4 - 1B8BDE2B57CEC99E = 1BCAEF39EEECBC46
 MFLO $22               // 1 bfc00034 16 eeecbc46
 CLO  $16 $22           // 1 bfc00038 10 00000003
 MFHI $24               // 1 bfc0003c 18 1bcaef39
 CLZ  $25 $24           // 1 bfc00040 19 00000003




 ADDI $8, $8, 0x1234    00100001000010000001001000110100
 LUI  $9      0x5678    00111100000010010101011001111000
 ADD  $10, $8, $9       00000001000010010101000000100000
 ADDI $4, $4, 0x1357    00100000100001000001001101010111
 LUI  $5      0x2468    00111100000001010010010001101000
 ADD  $6, $4, $5        00000000100001010011000000100000
 ADDI $11, $11, 0x2046  00100001011010110010000001000110

 LUI  $12       0x7f6e  00111100000011000111111101101110

 ADD  $13, $11, $12     00000001011011000110100000100000
 MULT $6, $10           00000000110010100000000000011000
 MADD $10, $13          01110001010011010000000000000000
 MFHI $21               00000000000000001010100000010000
 MSUB $21, $13          01110010101011010000000000000100
 MFLO $22               00000000000000001011000000010010
 CLO  $16 $22           01110010110000001000000000100001
 MFHI $24               00000000000000001100000000010000
 CLZ  $25 $24           01110011000000001100100000100000
